ROW.NAME: Food and Beverage
ROW.DESCRIPTION: Food and Beverage category includes snacks, drinks, pantry staples, and gourmet items. Procure high-quality, fresh, and diverse products to meet customer needs for daily consumption and special occasions.

ROW.NAME: Home Appliance
ROW.DESCRIPTION: Home Appliance category includes products like refrigerators, washing machines, microwaves, dishwashers, and air conditioners. Procure reliable, energy-efficient models to meet diverse household needs and enhance daily living.

ROW.NAME: Health and Beauty
ROW.DESCRIPTION: Health and Beauty category covers skincare, haircare, personal care products, cosmetics, and wellness items. Procure high-quality, effective products that promote well-being and enhance personal appearance for our customers.

ROW.NAME: Electronics
ROW.DESCRIPTION: Electronics category includes computer-related products like RAM, monitors, pendrives, and peripherals. Procure reliable, high-performance components to meet customer demands for quality computing and storage solutions.

ROW.NAME: Toys and Sports
